Santusita，Santuṭṭha： m．[BSk．Saṁtuṣita] 刪兜率，善知足，都率天 [六欲天の一]．=Tusita
Santusita，已取悅，已快樂。參考 Santuṭṭha。

Santusita：1．Santusita．Chief of the devas of the Tusita world．（D．i．218； A．iv．243； S．iv．280）．It was the name of the Bodhisatta when he was in Tusita （BuA．45； J．i．48） and also that of his successor （J．i．81）．At important festivals，Santusita appears with a yak tail whisk．E．g．，Mhv．xxxi．78．

2．Santusita．One of the palaces of Konāgamana Buddha before his renunciation．Bu．xxiv．18．

3．Santusita．A king．See Samphusita．
